FastAPI React MongoDB help]

external_database:
	options: y/n
	default: n
		whether to use external database like mongodb atlas.
external_db_uri:
	default: None
		[OPTIONAL] External database uri. skip this if not using one.
mongodb_user
	default: root
		[OPTIONAL] Database user. skip this if using external database.
mongodb_user
	default: password
		[OPTIONAL] Database password. skip this if using external database.
secret_key:
	default:secret_key
		secret key to use in api.
